item.title: Brown Team
item.description: The Brown team is meant to be over accommodations and, ideally, will end up having a controlling vote on a variety of shelters. Control of Space For any given space, ‚Äúownership‚Äù is through a layering of controls by various teams.

item.title: Green Team
item.description: The Green Team is for all non-human life, including the possibility that a form of consciousness exists in crystalline forms like glass, thus rule #1: ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt break glass.‚Äù ...

item.title: Gold Team
item.description: The Establishment, specifically the United States law enforcement apparatus.

item.title: Escrow
item.description: One of the central questions for the courier network is how to prevent theft. This is accomplished by the distributor assigning a value to each parcel they ship & before another party can take possession, they have to stake that assigned cost to be forfeit if they are found responsible for its loss.

item.title: Par
item.description: Goods and people are constantly being shuttled around by a set of couriering pairs. The software that is running in the vehicle is called Par. Depending on the situation, the two people in the car will fill a variety of roles.

item.title: Presidency
item.description: The calendars for the post-revolution era will kick off with the inauguration of a U.S. President.
